column5: I put 7-8 hrs out on the lake this weekend. Sat fished for pickeral but that wasn't working out so I fished for bass and caught 20 between myself and my brother. All the bass were between 1.5 and 3 pounds with three lost ones around 5 lbs. They were caught on a lipless crankbait and a jointed wally diver. Then went out sat evening for a hour and caught a bunch more smallies and this pickeral.walleye He was also caught on the lipless crankbait. Wen t out sunday and caught a bunch more smallies. Goin out muskie fishin tommorrow after work and will give a report. Cheers Jeff
Nice report Jeff, good luck tomorrow! -Brian

Nice goin Jeff!  I was up on friday and battled the 4 footers for a few hours. Ended up with one nice eye on a musky troll, and 2 dinks jigging. It was tough fishing, too windy.  We'll have to hook up out there yet....  Sinker
Nice! You can always count on the bass to have a great day of fishing!
